summary: Stops NPCs from telling you to put your clothes back on.
descriptionHtml:
This very basic mod does only one thing. It keeps NPCs from commenting about your nakedness.

This plugin is best used at the bottom of your load order, to make it work with custom NPCs, such as those found in my other mod, Bathing Beauties (or Beefcake) Luxury Suite (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11427).

==================
Installation:

Either drop the esp file into your Data folder, or install using NMM.


==================
Uninstallation:

Remove the esp file or uninstall with NMM.


=====================
Permissions:
Do not upload this mod to another site without my permission.
author: Migal
